mapper.select: select T.*, name from (select RV.*, rownum R from (select * from review where placeNum=#{placeNum} and reviewDesc like '%'||#{search}||'%') RV) T join member on (T.memberNum = member.memberNum) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
select count(reviewNum) from review where placeNum=#{placeNum} and reviewDesc like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select sum(reviewRate) from review where placeNum=#{placeNum}
